default_styles.description: These defaults are only used when an invalid style is specified. They shouldn't be edited.

polygon.description: Defines the color and draw group properties of polygons.

color.description: The polygon color expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

draw_group.description: Defines the grouping of polygons for the purpose of rendering order.

traffic.description: Defines the appearance of roads with traffic on the map.

dashed.description: If true, roads with traffic are dashed; if false, roads with traffic are solid.

outlined.description: If true, roads with traffic are outlined; if false, roads with traffic are not outlined.

draw_group1.description: Defines the grouping of roads with traffic for the purpose of rendering order.

color1.description: The color of roads with traffic expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

width1.description: Controls the width in points (per zoom level) of roads with traffic. The number of values in the array must match the number of available zoom levels to the engine.  This is currently 17 zoom levels.

items.description: The number of widths in the width array.

model_scale.description: Sets the scaling of the vehicle model. DEPRECATED. DO NOT CHANGE

adi_line.description: Controls the color and width (per zoom level) of the ADI line. (Automatic Deviation Indicator) This is a line from the vehicle to the closest point on the route when off-road

color.description: Controls the color of the ADI.

width.description: Controls the width in points (per zoom level) of the ADI line.

items.description: The number of widths in points in the width array.

speed_average_samples.description: Number of speed samples to average over to smooth out the calculated speed. This is used by the predictive camera machinery.

color1.description: Shall set with alpha value to get half-transparent effect.

color2.description: Shall set with alpha. It is used for mask cover the one with color1.

border_color1.description: The color of the border of inner range.

border_color2.description: The color of the border of outer range.

border_width.description: Controls the width in points (per zoom level) of the range borders.

items.description: The number of widths in points in the width array.

damping.description: The amount of time the ring takes to animate size change (in seconds).

start_width_for_coarse.description: The start width of rings in animation for coarse GPS.

end_width_for_coarse.description: The end width of rings in animation for coarse GPS.

start_width_for_accurate.description: The start width of rings in animation for accurate GPS.

end_width_for_accurate.description: The end width of rings in animation for accurate GPS.

radius_speed_for_coarse.description: The radius speed of rings in animation for coarse GPS.

radius_speed_for_accurate.description: The radius speed of rings in animation for accurate GPS.

coarse_ring_frequency.description: The frequency to generate new ring in animation for coarse GPS.

accurate_ring_frequency.description: The frequency to generate new ring in animation for accurate GPS.

max_accurate_ring_num.description: The maximum number of rings generated in animation for accurate GPS.

billboard_labels.description: Defines the appearance of billboard labels.

style.description: Must be billboard_label.  DO NOT CHANGE

priority.description: Defines the order in which overlapping objects are culled. The higher the priority, the more likely to survive culling.

icon_name.description: The UNC(Universal Naming Convention) name of the graphic.

font_face.description: Name of the font to use.

font_size.description: Size of the font (in points) to ask the system for.

font_halo_size.description: Size of the font halo (in points).

outline_color.description: The text outline color expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

text_x.description: The horizonal position of the text (in points) relative to the annotation pivot point.

text_y.description: The vertical position of the text (in points) relative to the annotation pivot point.

icon_w.description: Width of the icon in points.

icon_h.description: Height of the icon in points.

icon_border_w.description: How much space to leave on either side of the text when stretching the billboard geometry to fit the text.

render_size.description: The size to draw the font. When requesting a number it may be more memory efficient to select one font size and change the render size.

cull_bounds_scale.description: How much space to leave around the billboard when fitting them onto the screen. If this is set to one, other billboards are culled only if they actually touch. If this is set to 2, the cull system considers the geometry to be twice as large as it appears on the screen to guarantee there is always some space in between them.

text_color.description: The color of the text expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

immunity_group.description: An identifier that the culling system can use to specify immunity from another group of cullable objects. This category is dynamic, ie, user defined.  Refer to the (cull) section for more information.

always_visible.description: If true, the text is always visible, overriding culling and priority.

animation_time.description: The amount of time the label takes to animate onto the screen (in seconds)

animation_type.description: The annotation transition effect type. Available values are "resizing" and "fading".

font_size.description: Size of the font to ask the system for.

render_size.description: The size to draw the font. When requesting a number it may more memory efficient to select one font size and change the render size.

text_color.description: The color of the text expressed in Internet style RGBA e.g. #FFDDCCAA.

outline_color.description: The text outline color expressed in Internet style RGBA e.g. #FFDDCCAA.

super_group.description: Objects in the same supergroup will coalesce into one icon when they collide in space.

always_visible.description: If true, the text is always visible, overriding culling and priority.

show_in_map.description: It indicates whether the annotation will show at the 2D/3D or both 2D and 3D map, the vaild value will be within '2d','3d','2d_and_3d'. e.g. '2d' means the annotation will show at 2D map.

animation_type.description: The annotation transition effect type. Available values are "resizing" and "fading".

outline_color.description: The text outline color expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g. #FFDDCCAA.

super_group.description: Objects in the same supergroup will coalesce into one icon when they collide in space.

always_visible.description: If true, the text is always visible, overriding culling and priority.

style.description: Must be landmark. DO NOT CHANGE.

immunity_group.description: An identifier that the culling system can use to specify immunity from another group of cullable objects. This category is dynamic, ie, user defined.  Refer to the (cull) section for more information.

always_visible.description: If true, the text is always visible, overriding culling and priority.

animation_time.description: The amount of time the label takes to animate onto the screen (in seconds)

priority.description: Defines the order in which overlapping objects are culled.

view.description: Defines the canvas and camera view properties.

default_fov.description: Camera Field-Of-View in degrees measured across the view diagonally.

default_heading.description: Default camera heading in degrees (true north).

default_declination_2d.description: Default camera declination in orthogonal mode. Zero degrees is horizontal. Negative 90 degrees is straight down. Set to -89 to avoid gimble lock.

default_declination_3d.description: Default camera declination in 3D mode. Zero degrees is horizontal. Negative 90 degrees is straight down.

default_eye_distance.description: Camera distance from lookat point on map. Units based on tile size.

default_zoom.description: Default zoom level. Currently 17 zoom levels in map, starting from -1 (most detailed) to 15 (furthest out).

default_range.description: Controls far clipping plane. DO NOT CHANGE.

default_blend_time.description: The default duration, in seconds, of the camera animation.  For example, camera panning.

default_zoom_lower_bound.description: The lowest zoom level allowed. (This is in log 2 space. Add one to this number to double the distance. Subtract one to halve it.)

default_zoom_speed.description: The speed at which the camera moves to a newly-specified zoom level. The units are roughly zoom levels per second.

default_vertical_offset.description: Specifies the amount, in fraction of the screen, to shift the point of interest on the screen vertically. In 'FollowVehicle' mode, the point of interest corresponds to the vehicle. Zero is center. One is top of screen. Negative one is bottom of screen.

default_horizontal_offset.description: Specifies the amount, in fraction of the screen, to shift the point of interest on the screen vertically.

2d_scale_factor.description: Allows all the annotations to be scaled together. (The name is historical.) DO NOT CHANGE.

default_view_scale.description: This will go away. Currently it is used to scale all 3D map elements to compensate for a change in the viewport size.

default_declination_lower_bound.description: Camera declination clamp lower bound. -90 is straight down. -89 is used to avoid gimbling problems.

default_declination_upper_bound.description: Camera declination clamp upper bound. 0 is horizontal.

billboard_perspective.description: Controls how much billboard label size is determined by perspective. 1 is normal perspective. 0 makes the billboard labels the same size on the screen regardless of where they are in the scene. 0.5 is nice, but default is 1.0 for backwards compatibility.

max_2d_road_text_duplicate_count.description: Maximum duplicate 2d duplicate label count. (So for example, Kifer Rd would only appear on the map x amount of times.

max_3d_road_text_duplicate_count.description: Maximum duplicate 3d duplicate label count. (So for example, Kifer Rd would only appear on the map x amount of times.

predictive_zoom.description: zoom levels to zoom out per 100 km/h

predictive_declination.description: degrees to shallow the camera declination angle per 100 km/h

touch.description: Defines the sensitiviy of touch events.

zoom_sensitivity.description: Specifies the sensitivity when a user touches the screen to zoom.

heading_sensitivity.description: How much to change the heading given a change in the touch position.

declination_sensitivity.description: How much to change the declination given a change in the touch position.

friction_factor.description: Specifies how much the map will 'coast' when touch events let up.

draw_groups.description: The sub-order in which data groups are rendered. This is applicable to polygons and edges.

render_order.description: The order in which map data gets drawn - aerial images first, scale bar last. The element in the beginning is rendered first.

base_tile_size.description: Server-specific tile size. Don't mess with this.

projected_bounding_box_color.description: The projected bounding box color and opacity expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #0000FFFF.

max_edge_segment_angle.description: The angle at which the geometry for a road will be broken into separate segments for rendering. This value helps to smooth the junction for sharp angles on edge data (roads, routes, etc...) DO NOT CHANGE.

max_edge_point_count.description: The maximum number of points a route segment is allowed to have. If reached, a new edge segment will be started.

max_vbo_vertex.description: The maximum number of vertices a single VBO is allowed to have. VBOs greater than this size are rejected.

max_vbo_vertex_per_frame.description: If the number of vertices contained in VBOs created this frame exceeds this number, stop building VBOs this frame and start again next frame.

road_texture.description: The file or resource containing the road texture image. DO NOT CHANGE.

traffic_texture.description: The file or resource containing the traffic texture image. DO NOT CHANGE.

arrow_texture.description: The file or resource containing the one-way arrow image.

arrow_color.description: The arrow color and opacity expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #0000FFFF.

line_segment_color.description: The line segment color of the directionless arrow segments and opacity expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #0000FFFF.

font_texture.description: DEPRECATED. The image file containing the text glyphs. Replaced by the glyph proxy.

outlinefont_texture.description: DEPRECATED. The image file containing the text glyph halos. Replaced by the glyph proxy.

artificial_time.description: An offset in seconds to be applied to wall-clock time. Used by the sky renderer.

user_texture_styles.description: A list of textures, defined under map.xxxx, to be used to pattern edges defined above. One example is map.rail_texture below.

rail_texture.description: UNC name of the texture used for railroads.  Also a default entry in user_texture_styles .

defaults.description: Defaults override any unreasonable property settings. These are not configurable. Use ITnMapEngine::SetXXXX(...) to override these values.

lod_bias.description: Number to add to the current zoom level. Used to overzoom or underzoom map data.

vbo_min_vertex_count.description: For geometry sets with fewer vertices than this, don't bother creating a VBO. Just use vertex attribute arrays directly.

show_culled_labels.description: Used for debugging. The engine will cull labels if the spline provided for them is too short. If this is set to true, it shows them anyway.

switch_2d_3d_declination.description: Angle at which the text changes from flat label text to billboard label text.

visibility_fraction_3d.description: When set to 1, the text will disappear as soon as it touches the screen border.  Greater than 1, the longer the text will stay on screen even though it is partially outside of the screen viewport. Range .5 to 1.5 .

max_label_curve_angle.description: Maximum angle at which to place charcters in the label before you eliminate the label.

max_label_curve_angle_range.description: Maximum angle range at which to place charcters in the label before you eliminate the label.

enable_fast_halo.description: True to use fast convolution algorithm to generate halo.

show_bounding_box_for_flat_feature.description: True to display bounding box for flat feature label.

flat_feature_bounding_box_color.description: Specify colors for bounding box display, use alpha 0 to turn it off individually

label.description: The color of glyph label in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

orthogonal.description: The color of orthogonal bounding box in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

optimized.description: The color of optimized bounding box in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

cull.description: Controls the behavior of the culling system

culls_per_second.description: The number of tests per second the engine should execute to see if objects collide and therefore should be culled.

adds_per_second.description: The number of cull objects (shields, POIs, billboard labels, etc.) tested for addition to the scene. The higher the number, the quicker objects appear on the map and the more the CPU is used.

coexists_by_default.description: A list of immunity groups (as defined elsewhere in the config) along with a boolean value to indicate whether or not this immunity group coexists with other immunity groups by default.

coexists.description: A list of immunity groups and an associated array of immunity groups with which the specified group EXPLICITLY coexists with.

sky.description: Defines the appearance of the sky.

moon_texture.description: The texture file to apply to the moon.

ground_color.description: The map background color and opacity expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

sunrise_sunset_turbidity.description: The haziness of the sky at sunrise/sunset time.

day_turbidity.description: The limit of haziness of the sky in day time.

night_turbidity.description: The limit of haziness of the sky in night time.

turbidity_per_sun_elevation.description: The haziness change ratio of the sky according to sun elevation.

alpha_scale.description: Defines how much the sky color blocks the sun, moon, and stars. 0.0-1.0, where 1.0 indicates the sun, moon and stars are not visible during the day, and 0.0 indicates there is essentially no sky color.

lower.description: How much to tip the sky dome to lower the effective horizon.

max_stars.description: The maximum number of stars to display in the night sky.

sun_moon_exaggeration.description: The amount to increase the size of the sun and moon.

breadcrumb.description: Determines the appearance and behavior of breadcrumbs.

record.description: True saves the breadcrumbs so that users can follow them; false does not save breadcrumbs.

length_meters.description: The length to represent for each breadcrumb.

spacing.description: The space between breadcrumbs, in units of base tile size where 1 is roughly equivalent to the horizontal size of a tile.

icon_size.description: The size of each breadcrumb, in units of base tile size where 1 is roughly equivalent to the horizontal size of a tile.

texture.description: The file to use for breadcrumb texture.

rebuild_distance.description: Distance after which the breadcrumb trail will be rebuilt, expressed in Mercator-adjusted meters.

texture.description: The texture to apply to the scalebar.

position_x.description: The vertical position of the scalebar. DEPRECATED.

position_y.description: The horizontal position of the scalebar. DEPRECATED.

horizontal_alignment.description: Valid values are one of: left, center, right.

vertical_alignment.description: Valid values are one of: top, center, bottom.

text_margin.description: Margin value for text.  Based on text alignment.

text_y.description: Position of scale bar text relative to bar graphic.

bar_width_minimum.description: Minimum size of the scale bar width.

disable_mipmapping.description: True disables mipmapping; false enables mipmapping.

disable_hardware_mipmapping.description: True disables hardware mipmapping; false enables hardware mipmapping.

traffic_annotation_group.description: Defines the properties for traffic annotation groups. If a group annotation is specified for a given annotation style, when two or more annotations sharing that group annotation style overlap, they will be replaced with the group annotation

icon_name.description: The UNC name of the graphic.

priority.description: Defines the order in which overlapping objects are culled.

text_x.description: The horizonal position of the text relative to the annotation pivot point.

text_y.description: The vertical position of the text relative to the annotation pivot point.

icon_x.description: The horizontal value of the pivot point relative to the lower left of the annotation. The pivot point is the exact location of the annotation.

icon_y.description: The vertical value of the pivot point relative to the lower left of the annotation. The pivot point is the exact location of the annotation.

icon_w.description: Width of the icon in points.

icon_h.description: Height of the icon in points.

font_face.description: Name of the font to use.

font_size.description: Size of the font to ask the system for.

render_size.description: The size to draw the font. When requesting a number it may more memory efficient to select one font size and change the render size.

text_color.description: The color of the text expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g., #FFDDCCAA.

outline_color.description: The text outline color expressed in Internet style RGBA, e.g. #FFDDCCAA.

always_visible.description: If true, the text is always visible, overriding culling and priority.
